issue.title: [CF 1403] Connecting different groups
issue.body:
I'd like to request a feature for an ability to connect undefined number of groups to share eg. visibility conditions.

 

For example, making a comprehensive UI combining multiple bar and icon groups at the moment means you are forced to copy the visibility conditionals over from one group to all "sub groups" if you want them to behave in a similar manner, and using certain conditions (like mouseover on a group) only applies to one group at a time.

 

This makes it cumbersome or in some cases totally impossible to start up this type of "meta group", but it also means if you ever want to change things up you need to repeat the process on all groups that share those conditions.


> Posted by CurseForge user Qustav_R | Imported from CurseForge issue #1403 | Raw

comments.body:
Probably not going to happen. Sorry. I just don't have time anymore, and this would be quite an undertaking.

 

You can right-click-and-drag from one group to another to copy the group conditions, though, which at least helps with the burden of copying them over and over again.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
